author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1649394106}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561199042657548', 'num_games_owned': 615, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1687829772}
review:
𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐠𝐚𝐦𝐞:

The idea is interesting, there are hardly any other similar 2D platformers with a skate theme (at least on Steam), but the implementation is wild, because there is no training, but there is only a list with combinations of 30 possible tricks and, as if at a time, well, there is NO WAY to REMEMBER them at all. You will have to suffer and sweat through heaps of failures, and most importantly, do not understand why... the picture and the music here are the simplest, the level of a Dandy and there is simply nothing to look at.

𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐮𝐥𝐭:

They would be ashamed to make such a 2D platformer about skateboarding with ridiculous and ridiculous animations. I don't advise anyone.

𝐑𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠:𝟸 /𝟷𝟶.

𝓘𝓕 𝓨𝓞𝓤 𝓛𝓘𝓚𝓔𝓓 𝓜𝓨 𝓡𝓔𝓥𝓘𝓔𝓦 , 𝓨𝓞𝓤 𝓒𝓐𝓝 𝓣𝓗𝓡𝓞𝓦 𝓐 𝓟𝓡𝓞𝓕𝓘𝓛𝓔 𝓐𝓦𝓐𝓡𝓓 , 𝓘 𝓦𝓘𝓛𝓛 𝓑𝓔 𝓖𝓡𝓐𝓣𝓔𝓕𝓤𝓛 !

author: {'steamid': '76561198796851430', 'num_games_owned': 927, 'num_reviews': 3722, 'playtime_forever': 6122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6122, 'last_played': 1646787726}
review:
《Skater 2D》最初以其颇具吸引力的复古2D像素艺术风格和看似无穷尽的滑板冒险玩法吸引了众多滑板爱好者和休闲游戏玩家的眼球。然而在深入体验之后，这款游戏却未能兑现其早期承诺，留下了一系列令人遗憾的问题，使得整体游戏体验大打折扣。

尽管游戏采用了讨喜的2D像素画面，但在视觉表现上显得过于粗糙且缺乏细节。场景设计重复度高，背景动画单一，长时间游玩后易造成审美疲劳。音效方面，虽然滑板动作的声音反馈尚可，但音乐曲目少且循环快，无法营造足够的沉浸氛围，缺失了现代滑板文化应有的活力与激情。

在核心的游戏玩法上，原本试图模仿经典滑板游戏的流畅体验，但在物理引擎的实现上明显存在缺陷。滑板手的动作切换不自然，控制响应迟钝，特别是在执行复杂技巧时，往往难以精确控制角色，导致挫败感强烈。关卡设计缺乏挑战性和多样性，任务目标单调乏味，长久下来容易让玩家失去继续探索的动力。

不幸的是在性能方面也暴露出问题。游戏时常出现卡顿现象，尤其是在高速滑行和多元素同屏显示时，帧数下降严重。此外游戏存档系统不稳定，偶尔会出现进度丢失的情况，这无疑是玩家最为诟病的一个痛点。

尽管《Skater 2D》瞄准了一个怀旧而广阔的市场，并在概念上具有潜力，但它在实际执行中错失了许多机会。从技术层面到内容设计，均未能达到当今独立游戏的标准。鉴于其存在的诸多问题，目前版本的《Skater 2D》很难满足期待已久的滑板游戏粉丝们，也不足以吸引休闲玩家长期驻足。开发商亟需针对上述问题进行大幅改进和优化，方能在竞争激烈的游戏市场中重拾口碑，真正让玩家感受到滑板文化的魅力所在。

author: {'steamid': '76561198289371761', 'num_games_owned': 1392, 'num_reviews': 365, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1623706165}
review:
Jogo de Esportes Radicais muito loco kkkk; esse é o Bichão mesmo hein Doido, até o lendário "Tony Hawk" jogou e sentiu aquela Nostalgia haha, muito simples e bem complexo; Manobras super Radicais, para se dar bem no jogo é só fazer manobras sem parar e pegar as letras, Cenários simples e Música Boa, à Plataforma Steam é tão Generosa.
Recomendo, Desenvolvedores obrigado pelas Cartas Colecionáveis, Boa Sorte à Todos.

review:
Cool concept but badly executed. Controls take awhile to get used to and I just don't like them. No controller support which isn't necessary but would be nice. If this came out in the late 90's I think I would of been a bit nicer to it but as this came out in 2016 I'm not. I know you can remap the controls which allowed me to get used to the controls but the game just doesn't play well.

Meh, I didn't like it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019871607', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 523, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 519, 'last_played': 1571396212}
review: I'll keep this simple. It's almost a masterpiece. It reimagines Pro Skater games in 2D better than I ever thought could be possible. However, I seem to have encountered a bug of some sort where I actually lost goals, and by proxy lost a level. I'm not sure how common this issue is. Anyway, the controls really aren't bad when you learn them, and I think any classic Pro Skater fan could find this enjoyable to some degree.

author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 227, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 227, 'last_played': 1544106383}
review: Неинтересный и сложный в управлении платформер, где нужно осваивать скейтборд. До всего нужно доходить самому. Как управлять персонажем, что вообще нужно делать и что от вас требует игра. Нет никакого обучения. Оказываетесь на уровне с различными трамплинами и платформами, и вперёд, разбираться, что к чему. Дизайн уровней минималистичен, а музыка простейшая. В общем, никаких плюсов. Игра никакого интереса не представляет и ни чем не цепляет.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065753865', 'num_games_owned': 872, 'num_reviews': 161, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1532706447}
review: Pro Skater 2D sucks. First of all you can play this on many other sites for absolutely free, but it seems what this developer has done was to make free games and publish them to sites like Kongregate then just upload these trash creations for a quick buck to Steam. Compare his Steam games to the games on Kongregate, it is very apparent he's done exactly what I've said. Sure, not all of the games appear, but still the point. https://www.kongregate.com/games/paala You'll find that Pro Skater 2D is on the list, actually a couple times. The gameplay and controls are also bad, things like manuals and grinds only work half the time so you'll mash your keys in frustration as nothing actually happens, and for my experience spine transfers didn't work. I was only able to pass the bare minimum on the first level, but that was enough to tell me that it was trash. Game doesn't look great either, but that wouldn't have mattered if there was actual fun gameplay. The only real positive thing I could say is that there are trading cards, but that isn't gonna make me think it's a good game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970602587', 'num_games_owned': 6364, 'num_reviews': 3660, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1512960196}
review:
https://youtu.be/npL_oZ8tGFQ

The skater experience of chaining tricks and collecting floating letters is a classic formula.  The transition to 2D however greatly changed the feel due to the added verticality of the level design.  This makes the game play more like a weak platformer shedding the skate theme and accomplishing neither of the goals the game sets out to achieve.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 859, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 787, 'last_played': 1509887785}
review:
This is a weird beast... it's a skating sim (I'm giving it this because the controls and combos are really in-dept with over a dozen skating moves you can try to recreate) but presented in a retro 2D pixel platformer style

Sadly the concept falls flat, the controls are janky and you just end up repeatedly falling over a lot, and the 2D thing really just doesn't work well, and it's not really clear what you should be trying to do or why

Unless you really really love both skateboarding and retro 2d pixel platformers, avoid this one

author: {'steamid': '76561198066346696', 'num_games_owned': 2239, 'num_reviews': 1253, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1495993075}
review: Задумка-то интересная, врядли найдутся другие подобные 2D-платформеры со скейтерской тематикой(по крайней мере на Стиме), но реализация диковатая, т.к. обучения никакого нет, а есть только список с комбинациями 30 возможных трюков и как бы за раз их ну вообще НИКАК НЕ ЗАПОМНИТЬ. Придётся мучаться и потеть сквозь кучи неудач, а самое главное непойми ради чего... картинка-то и музыка здесь простейшие, уровня Денди и смотреть просто не на что. Постыдились бы делать такой 2D-платформер про скейтинг со смехотворненькими и нелепенькими анимациями.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071970879', 'num_games_owned': 3035, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1495344142}

author: {'steamid': '76561197991880022', 'num_games_owned': 2900, 'num_reviews': 311, 'playtime_forever': 182, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1489367360}
review:
Cheap, in all aspect.
In general, skater games is not in my heart (BMX guy, sry), so this review could be a "hater" kind of.
But I remember I tried Tony Hawk's Pro Skateboarding on my friend's PSX, and that was awesome!
Also I seen some online flash games, which was good enough.
So...I didn't expected an AAA title, but this is way under my expectations.
- Physics / dynamics is afwul
- Control is horrible

Yeah-yeah, cards, but that doesn't save this title.
But what could?
- overall better graphics (bigger sprite for example)
- A "map editor"
- A decent soundtrack

Any good thing? Yeah, the combos.
And yeah, cards, but that doesn't save this title.
I could mention OlliOlli, but that's 10 times expensiver... Maybe on sale, you should get that! :D

You still want to try out Pro Skater 2D?
Here is it, for free...
http://www.chipgames.net/game/th-pro-skater-2d.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198209073544', 'num_games_owned': 408, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1011, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1497984187}
review:
ok ill keep it short but honest

the game has horrible controls, granted you can change them in options, but skate games are hard to control without a controller imo

the horrible controls leads to doing simple tasks to become a challenge on its own. 

could only manage to do 3 goals on level 1 because the controls made it to difficult to do anything

also THIS GAME IS COMPLETLY FREE ON MANY FLASH GAME SITES! LITERALLY ALL IT SEEMS THE DEV DID WAS CHANGE THE NAME SLIGHTLY! THIS IS "TUDY HAWKS PRO SKATER 2D"

review:
Pretty good adaption of the 1991 classic Skate or Die: Tour de Thrash for the Nintendo Gameboy.

6/10, gift to people as a joke when it's on sale for less than a cent.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019816374', 'num_games_owned': 1357, 'num_reviews': 1685, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1478169607}
review:
I get the appeal of skating games. I really like skating games.
Skating games that use WASD for tricks and directional keys for movement are annoying.
It is customizable, but I feel like there must be a better way to do it? Contextual button pressins or something?
Anyway, can't say I am a fan of this.
Also, the game is 4:3 default with no way to change. It is 2016 :) 16:9 is what most people are playing on guys.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q4y0tQ5ATUo

author: {'steamid': '76561198016096893', 'num_games_owned': 11947, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1482127478}
review:
Данная игра своего рода простейший платформер, вот только задачи здесь немного другие. Да и управление в игре ну очень уж сложное. Признаюсь честно, я да же и первого уровня не смог пройти, так как не разобрался полностью в управлении. Да и задача не поставлена в игре.
Что нужно сделать для прохождения уровня?
Без понятия, может собрать все буквы на уровне? или сделать определенные трюки?

Минусы игры:
- нет обучения
- нет поставленной задачи
- нет достижений

Ставлю плюс, за оригинальность идеи и возможно разработчик добавит в игру недостающее.
